document_data.caption: An aerial view of the Full Sails, standing to the right of the red [[Arnagus the Shipwright's residence|residence]] of [[Arnagus]]
document_data.name: Full Sails
document_data.location: [[Net Street (south)|Net Street]] and [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]], [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.owner: [[Most Diligent League of Sail-Makers and Cordwainers]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Full Sails''' was a tavern that doubled as the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Most Diligent League of Sail-Makers and Cordwainers]].
document_data.Location: This building was located along [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]]. It stood to the right of the [[Arnagus the Shipwright's residence|residence]] of [[Arnagus|Arnagus the Shipwright]].
document_data.Reputation: The Full Sails was among some of the more notable and recognizable buildings in the Dock Ward, considered by locals to be a landmark.
